description: Jack and Blake look amazing together. We took them on a little day-trip on a boat to have some fun tubing and lounging around. The sun was strong, so sunscreen was a must. Jack squirted a little too much on Blake’s chest and rubbed it all over. Blake just sat back and relaxed. “I’m used to being covered in white stuff, it’s fine!” These two hunks couldn’t keep their hands to themselves! They touched and kissed every chance they got! We knew this was going to be a great, cum-filled day! Jack really gave it to Blake, and even after they were all done, they still couldn’t keep their hands off each other! “I think I found my new favorite!” Jack just laid there, worn out in absolute bliss while Blake continued to feel him up…
title: Jack & Blake: Bareback
